title: Never Go Alone
description: The corridor beyond the ghost-terminal splits into three mirrored halls.
Each hall resonates with a Dreamweaver cadence, inviting you to choose an Echo companion.

abilities.name: RevealSafeTiles
abilities.effect: Highlights stable ASCII ground and prevents pitfall glyphs from spawning this tier.

abilities.name: SanctifyGlyph
abilities.effect: Converts a corrupted glyph into a healing node once per tier.

abilities.name: PhaseSkip
abilities.effect: Bypass one locked chamber or sealed door per tier.

abilities.name: EchoDecoy
abilities.effect: Drops a decoy sprite that absorbs Omega Echo pursuit for one turn.

abilities.name: GlyphBreaker
abilities.effect: Shatters a door glyph to force an alternate route.

abilities.name: AnchorStride
abilities.effect: Stabilises a collapsing bridge for a single traversal.

tiers.objective: Use a companion ability to open the primary corridor and maintain distance from Omega Echo.
tiers.echoModifier: If Mischief is absent, Omega Echo seals door glyphs one turn earlier.

tiers.objective: Chain two abilities to cross collapsing platforms and redirect the Echo.
tiers.echoModifier: If Light is absent, safe tiles flicker and require rerouting.

tiers.objective: Trigger GlyphBreaker to open the final path and outrun the Omega Echo emerging from the opposite side.
tiers.echoModifier: If Wrath is absent, the Echo gains the first move on this tier.

finale.successNarration: All companions align their sigils, sealing the exit before Omega Echo can overwrite the passphrase.
finale.fallbackNarration: One companion becomes a lingering Echo, altering future abilities.
